User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account on the platform, whether student, affiliate, or admin.

profilePicture.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

walletBalance.description: User's points balance in their wallet.

affiliateCode.description: Unique affiliate code assigned to the user.

suspended.description: Indicates whether the user account is suspended.

adminNotes.description: Notes added by admin regarding the user account.

trustScore.description: User's trust score as determined by AutoHandle engine.

Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course offered on the platform.

tagline.description: A short, catchy tagline for the course.

lessons.description: An array of lessons associated with the course.

rating.description: The average user rating for the course.

highlights.description: Key features or highlights of the course.

whoIsThisFor.description: Defines the target audience for the course.

courseFaqs.description: Frequently asked questions specific to the course.

Lesson.title: Lesson
Lesson.description: Represents a single lesson within a course.

content.description: Content of the lesson (e.g., text, video URL).

order.description: Order of the lesson within the course.

Enrollment.title: Enrollment
Enrollment.description: Represents a user's enrollment in a course.

enrollmentDate.description: Date when the user enrolled in the course.

Certificate.title: Certificate
Certificate.description: Represents a certificate issued to a user upon course completion. Contains both private and public verification data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the certificate record within the user's subcollection.

studentName.description: Full name of the student at the time of issue.

courseName.description: Name of the course at the time of issue.

issueDate.description: Date when the certificate was issued.

certificateCode.description: The unique, non-guessable code for public verification (e.g., CV-2024-ABCDE).

status.description: The current status of the certificate.

certificateUrl.description: URL to the visual certificate (page or PDF).

PaymentTransaction.title: PaymentTransaction
PaymentTransaction.description: Represents a payment transaction made by a user to purchase points.

amount.description: Amount paid by the user in INR.

pointsAwarded.description: Number of points awarded to the user for the transaction.

upiTransactionReference.description: UPI transaction reference number provided by the user.

screenshotUrl.description: URL to the screenshot of the payment (optional).

status.description: Status of the transaction (e.g., pending, approved, rejected).

transactionDate.description: Date and time of the transaction.

adminNotes.description: Notes added by admin regarding the transaction.

AffiliateCommission.title: AffiliateCommission
AffiliateCommission.description: Represents a commission earned by an affiliate for a referral.

referredUserId.description: Reference to User (referred user). (Relationship: User 1:N AffiliateCommission)

commissionPercentage.description: Percentage of the purchase amount earned as commission.

pointsAwarded.description: Number of points awarded to the affiliate as commission.

transactionDate.description: Date and time when the commission was earned.

ApiLog.title: ApiLog
ApiLog.description: Represents a log entry for an API request.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

requestUrl.description: The URL of the API request.

requestMethod.description: The HTTP method used for the request (e.g., GET, POST).

responseStatusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the API response.

affiliateCode.description: Affiliate code included in the API request (if any).

ApiKey.title: ApiKey
ApiKey.description: Represents an API key that can be used to access the API.

id.description: Unique identifier for the API key.

userId.description: Reference to User (admin who created the key). (Relationship: User 1:N ApiKey)

description.description: Description of the API key's purpose.

rateLimit.description: The rate limit for the API key (requests per minute/hour).

readOnly.description: Indicates whether the API key has read-only access.

createdDate.description: Date and time when the API key was created.

revoked.description: Indicates whether the API key has been revoked.

AdminActionLog.title: AdminActionLog
AdminActionLog.description: Represents a log entry for an action performed by an administrator.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

adminId.description: Reference to User (admin performing the action). (Relationship: User 1:N AdminActionLog)

action.description: Description of the action performed (e.g., 'Approved payment', 'Suspended user').

affectedEntity.description: The entity affected by the action (e.g., 'User', 'PaymentTransaction').

affectedEntityId.description: ID of the entity affected by the action.

actionTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the action was performed.

Log.title: Log
Log.description: Represents a system log entry for auditing and monitoring.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

source.description: The origin of the log entry.

message.description: A human-readable description of the event.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a user-submitted or AI-generated review for a course.

userId.description: Reference to User who wrote it. Can be an admin's ID for generated reviews.

userName.description: Denormalized user's full name or generated name.

userAvatar.description: Denormalized user's avatar or a placeholder.

moderationReason.description: Reason from AI moderation if rejected or pending.

SiteSettings.title: Site Settings
SiteSettings.description: Global configuration for the website. This is intended to be a singleton document.

siteName.description: The public name of the website.

tagline.description: The tagline or slogan for the website.

description.description: A short description of the site for SEO purposes.

footerText.description: The text displayed in the website footer.

logoUrl.description: URL for the site's primary logo.

maintenanceMode.description: If true, the public-facing site is disabled.

enableGoogleLogin.description: If true, users can log in with Google.

enableEmailLogin.description: If true, users can log in with email/password.

disablePurchases.description: If true, all course purchases are disabled.

upiId.description: The UPI ID for receiving payments.

receiverName.description: The name of the UPI account holder.

paymentInstructions.description: Text displayed to users on the payment page.

qrCodeUrl.description: URL for the payment QR code image.

socialLinks.description: A list of social media links for the site footer.

Coupon.title: Coupon
Coupon.description: Represents a discount coupon for courses.

value.description: The discount amount (percentage or fixed value).

status.description: Whether the coupon is currently usable.

usageLimit.description: The maximum number of times this coupon can be used in total. 0 for unlimited.

usageCount.description: The number of times this coupon has been used.

expiresAt.description: The expiration date and time for the coupon.

applicableCourseIds.description: An array of course IDs this coupon applies to. Empty array means it applies to all courses.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to support the CourseVerse application. Payment transactions have been moved to a top-level `/paymentTransactions` collection to simplify queries and security rules, enhancing reliability for admin dashboard analytics. Other collections like `/users`, `/courses`, and `/certificates` remain structured for clear ownership and access patterns.
